text: 1:18 Aposel 26:18; Efesus 2:12; 4:4; Kolosi 1:12Kɨ kamaghɨn Godɨn azangsɨsi, ian nɨghnɨzim kuighirɨghtɨ ia Godɨn angazangarimɨn ganam. Egh ia kamaghɨn fogham, God ian diazɨma bizir aghuir ia fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzuai iti. Egh kamaghɨn fogham, bizir aghuir God uan gumazamizibar anɨngamiba, da bar ekevegha pɨn ko.
